extendedInfo.description: "A worthy addition to anyone's shoot'em-up collection, regardless of whether you're a new-comer or a veteran to the genre." - Andrew Nesvadba, appspy.com (5/5)"Super Laser is worth every dollar and Iâd recommend it to everyone, be new to the genre or a veteran at it." - touchaholics.com (4/5) Are you a Top Gun at Flight Shooter Games? Super Laser takes you back to your childhood where games like Raiden and 1942 left you with blisters on your thumbs and an empty wallet.Super Laser is guaranteed to please, it's so good that on Day 1 of Release it has been "Featured by Apple as New and Noteworthy". "In Year 2036, the Earth's population has reduced to only 1.5 billions due to resources shortage and global climate warming. The bizarre climate is somehow suitable for the aliens to move in. These aliens can attach to any organizm or machinery to evolve into new forms of life. The Earth has unfortunately become their second home. The human beings must act fast to destroy the aliens before they conquer the whole world. The Earth Alliance secretly sends a fighter equipped with the ultimate and most advanced weapon, called "Super Laser", to the aliens' stronghold..."Imagine hordes of alien enemies rushing towards you, then imagine turning them into space dust at the flick of your finger! You're flying a futuristic space ship capable of blowing nasty aliens into smithereens, use that power and be the hero that saves the world!What's it got:- Explosions so big that you'll nearly feel the heat on your face!- Laser effects, superb animations and graphics that will make your eyes pop out of your head!- Remember standing around the arcade with your friends, sinking quarters into Raiden, 1942? Now you can get all that and more right in the palm of your hand. - 6 levels of dodging, crushing and incinerating hordes of alien scum and the grand finale, a battle royale with a boss so tough he might as well reach out of your Android device and punch you in the face!Mind blowing weapons, lasers and missiles that go boom!- 3 difficulty levels will sort the riff from the raff.- 3 different control methods to suit all hero's.- Developed by the team that brought you the chart topping, smash hit game "iFighter".

reviews.title: Needs keyboard controls
reviews.comment: This game would definitely be a 5 imo if I could use keyboard controls. Please update for that I want to love this game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game... but
reviews.comment: I am finding that the second level boss is too difficult to beat. I guess only advanced players will be able to get through that. Make it little easy then it wil be more fun to further in the game.
reviews.author: Sagar Agrawal

reviews.title: Bona
reviews.comment: It\'s perfect. I like it\'s moving control. Some problem, it\'s not full screen on my device. Please fix it. Thx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Old skool cool-
reviews.comment: Perfect old skool shooter!! The free price tag is surprising because of the amount detail that they put into it- thanks    also: their other shooter(i fighter 1945) is just as good too-
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: its ok
reviews.comment: I first played it on my s3 mini and it works fine but when I put it on my tablet the sound gose all wired. Its using android 4.0
reviews.author: Stewart McCarlie

reviews.title: Great stuff
reviews.comment: Runs super smooth on my htc one x. Great visuals. Only flaw was the ship doesn\'t keep up with my finger. But still doesn\'t hinder the gameplay at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game but. ......
reviews.comment: This a great shooter. It works great on my ipod touch 4 and my Toshiba excite, but on my Samsung Galaxy S 3 the top 10 percent is of the screen is unviewable.  Ive tried reloading it, but the issue is there. I\'m using jellybean and ios 6.
reviews.author: Paul Tackett

reviews.title: Wanted to like this...
reviews.comment: ... because the aliens look cool but, like others have said, the top of the screen looks like it was out of sync or something. And why is the bomb on the right? Awkward for people who control their ship with their right hand! All weapons are reset on the next level, and some of the bosses are filling up too much screen space meaning nowhere for you to run! If you could fix them you could release a pay version...
reviews.author: Kevin Chan

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Ivy Been on a shooter craze and this game really satisfys. Awesome gameplay and awesome music. Every thing you want from from a drop down shooter
reviews.author: Kevin Burns

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Finished. All the levels up to 6 wish they will add more stages so i could play it more , the game is awesome..l o v e  it
reviews.author: Janssen Balboa

reviews.title: wonderful
reviews.comment: This is in my opinion the #1 space shooter on the market, been searching for something like this for so long, it reminds me of Zanac , its even better. Smooth controls , beautiful graphics, tons of upgrades and weapons. Thumbs up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: Best vert scroller on Android! Much in the vein of many traditional shooters out there, like Raiden, this one plays great on the Nexus 7!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: An excellent Android shmup.
reviews.comment: Great graphics, great soundtrack, challenging gameplay.  Only one request: If you claim that your final boss is \"so tough he might as well reach out of your Android device and punch you in the face\", then give us less lasers and more near undodgable bullet hell so that he can become \"so tough he might as well reach out of your Android device, punch you 150 times in the face, kick you to the ground, come out even more from your device and continue beating you up on the floor.\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super Laser: The Alien Fighter
reviews.comment: Screen appears fragmented. Display is not one cohesive piece. It shows fragmented pieces of what should be a unified. Played on Sony Ericsson experia dual core snapdragon 1.5 GHz. Pls correct.
reviews.author: joseph kirschbaum

reviews.title: Great work fellas
reviews.comment: This game is fantastic. Looks great,plays great and its free. I like the way it auto-locks on targets and fires the lazer while you\'re taken\' down ships and enemy fighters. Im playing this game on a cheap htc piece of crap and plays great no bugs yet. Well done. Ps. Thanx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I\'m keeping this little gem
reviews.comment: excellent & tough vert scrolling shooter one for any shooter fans game library :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the BEST top-down shooters I\'ve played
reviews.comment: Wow! This game is really good in the top-down shooter genre. I have this installed on both my Galaxy Nexus and NOOK Color (runs choppy on the NOOK). Really reminds me of great games like Raiden, and Raystorm. Graphics/Art/Animation all done well. I would recommend. It makes a fun time-killer game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the very best in genre
reviews.comment: Wow! This is easily among the top top-down shooters (and I\'ve played a lot). If you like 1942, Raiden, Tyrian, Shogun, etc. you\'ll love this. Awesome graphics and controls to suit anyone. Only one problem: please give us a pay-to-remove ads option like iFighter 1945; I\'ll buy it immediately. Then 5 stars...  Additional note: If you install Adaptive Rotation Lock, this game adapts to landscape mode with no problems!
reviews.author: Stephen Cotterill

reviews.title: Very fun shooter game
reviews.comment: Fun and tough to beat. Needs more weapon upgrades and new levels. Screen bug, which cut the screen space by 1/2 inch at the top on Galaxy S3. Fix the bug and add new enhancements and you will get 5 stars. In the mean time, UNINSTALL. Keep improving the game developer!
reviews.author: Son Pham

reviews.title: I still want Raiden
reviews.comment: It\'s an ok game but the screen flickers, there\'s ghosting on the left and right edges of the screen and the ship lags a bit. PLEASE FIX :-\\
reviews.author: Jay Anthony
